pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python module for sending sms with Sinch----------------------------------------Installation~~~~~~~~~~~~.. code:: bash pip install sinchsmsUsage example~~~~~~~~~~~~~.. code:: python import time from sinchsms import SinchSMS number = '+46000000001' message = 'Hello from Sinch!' client = SinchSMS(your_app_key, your_app_secret) print("Sending '%s' to %s" % (message, number)) response = client.send_message(number, message) message_id = response['messageId'] response = client.check_status(message_id) while response['status'] != 'Successful': print(response['status']) time.sleep(1) response = client.check_status(message_id) print(response['status']).. note:: You will need a Sinch account for getting your application key and secret. Visit www.sinch.com to get started.Using as command line script~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~.. code:: bash ./sinchsms.py usage: sinchsms.py <application key> <application secret> send <number> <message> <from_number> sinchsms.py <application key> <application secret> status <message_id>
